version_description:
We’re making it easier with the following updates:
• Updating user experience and fixing bugs
• Implementation of Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
• “Add to Wallet” button for devices running iOS 9+

-Minor bug fixes
Introducing Cinemark Connections!
Get rewarded for every laugh, howl, and snort. Cinemark Connections provides you with unique experiences by giving you exclusive benefits and one-of-a-kind rewards! Earn points every time you buy tickets or Concession stand snacks, plus a few other ways that don't cost you anything. And --jaw drop-- it's free to join, so sign up now through our app!

-Minor bug fixes
Introducing Cinemark Connections!
Get rewarded for every laugh, howl, and snort. Cinemark Connections provides you with unique experiences by giving you exclusive benefits and one-of-a-kind rewards! Earn points every time you buy tickets or Concession stand snacks, plus a few other ways that don't cost you anything. And --jaw drop-- it's free to join, so sign up now through our app!

-Minor bug fixes
Introducing Cinemark Connections!
Get rewarded for every laugh, howl, and snort. Cinemark Connections provides you with unique experiences by giving you exclusive benefits and one-of-a-kind rewards! Earn points every time you buy tickets or Concession stand snacks, plus a few other ways that don't cost you anything. And --jaw drop-- it's free to join, so sign up now through our app!

- Added Facebook sharing to Connections
- Bug fixes and minor app enhancements

- Added a Notification Center to access notifications.
- Added ability to purchase Gift Cards within the app.
- Enhancements to Connections.
- Added support for Touch Sign In for easy access to the app.

We regularly release updates to make your Cinemark movie experience even better. See you at the movies!

• Enhancements to improve Cinemark’s user experience
• Updated look of Cinemark Connections home screen
• View multiple rewards at one time within Cinemark Connections
• Get details on Cinemark Connections rewards before redeeming

Introducing Cinemark Movie Club, the Movie-Lover’s Membership! Benefits include:
• One 2D ticket per month for $8.99*
• 20% off concessions
• Unused tickets roll over
• Share benefits with a friend
• Add-on tickets for $8.99
• Waived online fees
*Visit cinemark.com/movieclub for details.

Plus, overall bug fixes and app improvements!

• Find a theatre or showtimes near you by using your location or by entering a ZIP code

Now on the Cinemark App! It’s easier than ever to earn rewards and enjoy the movies

Cinemark Movie Rewards:
•Cinemark now presents Cinemark Movie Rewards: Your Path to Free Tickets & More!

Faster Navigation:
•Quick access to movies, rewards, theatres and more

New Home Screen:
•View your tickets, rewards and gift cards from one central place

Light or Dark Mode:
•Easily switch your display preferences between light or dark mode

Truth may be stranger than fiction at the moment, but the movies have always had a way of connecting us -- and always will.

We hope to welcome you back to a Cinemark theatre in the near future.

We will continue to regularly release updates to make your Cinemark experience even better. Our latest updates include:
- Paused Movie Club Memberships
- Extended expiration for Cinemark Movie Rewards points, rewards and credits
- Improved the app experience by remembering your last visited theatre
- Bug fixes to improve your experience

Get ready for summer at the movies with our latest update!
 
* Order your Snacks in a Tap in the app and skip the line! You can now add your food and drink to an existing ticket purchase
* Enhanced notifications: be sure to enable push notifications so you don't miss out on special offers and movie updates
* Bug fixes and performance improvements
